de.a46.memory.gui
Class RightPanel

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--java.awt.Panel
                    |
                    +--de.a46.memory.gui.RightPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExitPanel, FieldPanel, HelpPanel
public abstract class RightPanel
extends java.awt.Panel

Class RightPanel is an abstract superclass for all panels been shown as right components in the mainPanel. These are the classes FieldPanel, HelpPanel and ExitPanel. All have same size of 480 x 480 pixel and need to implement the two methods defined below.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Till Zoppke
See Also:
Serialized Form
